mapper.select: SELECT hp.hmo, hp.mno, hp.ino, hp.overview, hp.title, hp.map_x, hp.map_y, img.storage_path AS storage_path, hp.created_at, hp.updated_at FROM hot_place hp LEFT JOIN image img ON hp.ino = img.ino WHERE -- 반경(meter) 내에 있는 데이터만 남김 ST_Distance_Sphere( POINT(hp.map_x, hp.map_y), POINT(#{mapX}, #{mapY}) ) <= #{meter} ORDER BY -- 거리 오름차순 정렬 ST_Distance_Sphere( POINT(hp.map_x, hp.map_y), POINT(#{mapX}, #{mapY}) )

SELECT hp.hmo, hp.mno, hp.ino, hp.overview, hp.title, hp.map_x, hp.map_y, img.storage_path AS storage_path, hp.created_at, hp.updated_at FROM hot_place hp LEFT JOIN image img ON hp.ino = img.ino WHERE hp.hmo = #{pno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hot_place (mno, ino, overview, title, map_x, map_y) VALUES (#{mno}, #{ino}, #{overview}, #{title}, #{mapX}, #{mapY})
mapper.update: UPDATE hot_place SET mno = #{mno}, ino = #{ino}, overview = #{overview}, title = #{title}, map_x = #{mapX}, map_y = #{mapY} WHERE hmo = #{hmo}
